Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%wt_id Message ID ID of the message in the database</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%wt_type Message type String of text that contains the type of message, being one of: text, image, audio, video, contact (for a contact card) or location</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%wt_senderid Sender ID ID of the person or group sending the message</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3>%wt_sendername Sender name Name of the person or group sending the message</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4>%wt_senderimage Sender image Picture of the person or group sending the message</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5>%wt_groupsenderid Group sender ID If the message comes from a group, this is the ID of the person inside the group</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES6>%wt_groupsendername Group sender name If the message comes from a group, this is the name of the person inside the group</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES6><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES7>%wt_groupsenderimage Group sender image If the message comes from a group, this is the picture of the person inside the group</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES7><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES8>%wt_timestamp Timestamp Timestamp marking when was the message sent (in millis from UNIX epoch)</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES8><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES9>%wt_message Message text If the message is of type "text" this contains the text being sent. If the type is "card" this contains the contact card</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES9><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES10>%wt_mediamimetype Media MIME type Media MIME type for image, audio and video messages</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES10><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES11>%wt_mediapath Media path Path to the file in the phone storage. It could be empty if the file hasn't been downloaded</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES11><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES12>%wt_latitude Latitude Latitude for a location message</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES12><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES13>%wt_longitude Longitude Longitude for a location message</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES13></StringArray>
